meanings.definition: The quality or state of being funky.
meanings.sent1: The funkinesses of the music made everyone dance.
meanings.sent2: I love the funkinesses of retro fashion.
meanings.sent3: The funky smell had a hint of funkinesses that made me wrinkle my nose.
meanings.sent4: Her style had a unique funkinesses that stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the funkinesses of old vinyl records and incense.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a strong or offensive odor.
meanings.sent1: The funkinesses of the garbage bin made me hold my breath.
meanings.sent2: The funkinesses of the cheese was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The funky socks had a funkinesses that could clear a room.
meanings.sent4: The alley was filled with the funkinesses of rotting food.
meanings.sent5: The funkinesses of the skunk spray lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: A feeling of unease or discomfort.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't shake off the funkinesses she felt after the nightmare.
meanings.sent2: The dark alley gave me a sense of funkinesses.
meanings.sent3: The horror movie left a lingering funkinesses in her mind.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence of the forest brought a sense of funkinesses.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house had an aura of funkinesses that sent shivers down my spine.
